title: Scatterbrain
lyrics:
9 ContributorsTranslationsPortuguêsScatterbrain Lyrics
Dun, dun-dun, dun, dun-dun
Alright

Got a lot of friends that I can't escape
Sleepin' in my head like a Motel 6
Hold it all together with a little duct-tape
It bends, it breaks
Got a lot of dreams, but I let them die
Ping pong, drip-drop, oh-my-my
The TV's on, but the noise is white
(What am I doing now?)

God, can I catch my breath
Not even for a second?
Chasin' Santa Ana Winds
And I obsess, I slow dance with the tension
Can you taste it on my lips?

I'm so scatterbrain
But when you touch me, it all goes away
Scatterbrain
For a second, I don't feel insane
Come medicate me
You might also like
I don't sleep at all, yeah, I've been countin' sheep
I look perfect on the surface, but a nightmare underneath
I got anger problems, I say things that I don't mean
Some people pay for therapy, I find it in the sheets

Catch my breath
Not even for a second
Chasin' Santa Ana Winds

I'm so scatterbrain
But when you touch me, it all goes away
Scatterbrain
For a second I don't feel insane
Come medicate me

(Scatterbrain)
I need you baby (Goes away)
I need it daily (Scatterbrain)
I need you baby (Feel insane)
Come medicate me

(Got a lot of friends that I can't escape, can't escape, can't escape)
(Sleepin' in my head like a Motel 6, Motel 6)
Come medicate meEmbed
